verses.verse: Unto you<WH3068>, O Lord, do I lift up<WH5375> my soul<WH5315>.
O my God<WH430>, I trust<WH982> in you<WH954>: let me not be ashamed, let not my enemies<WH341> triumph over me<WH5970>.
Yes<WH6960>, let none that wait on you be ashamed<WH954>: let them be ashamed<WH954> which transgress<WH898> without cause<WH7387>.
Show<WH3045> me your ways<WH1870>, O Lord<WH3068>; teach<WH3925> me your paths<WH734>.
Lead<WH1869> me in your truth<WH571>, and teach<WH3925> me<WH430>: for you are the God of my salvation<WH3468>; on you do I wait<WH6960> all the day<WH3117>.
Remember<WH2142>, O Lord<WH3068>, your tender mercies<WH7356> and your lovingkindnesses<WH2617>; for they have been ever of old<WH5769>.
Remember<WH2142> not the sins<WH2403> of my youth<WH5271>, nor my transgressions<WH6588>: according to your mercy<WH2617> remember<WH2142> you me for your goodness<WH2898>' sake<WH3068>, O Lord.
Good<WH2896> and upright<WH3477> is the Lord<WH3068>: therefore will he teach<WH3384> sinners<WH2400> in the way<WH1870>.
The meek<WH6035> will he guide<WH1869> in judgment<WH4941>: and the meek<WH6035> will he teach<WH3925> his way<WH1870>.
All the paths<WH734> of the Lord<WH3068> are mercy<WH2617> and truth<WH571> unto such as keep<WH5341> his covenant<WH1285> and his testimonies<WH5713>.
For your name<WH8034>'s sake<WH3068>, O Lord, pardon<WH5545> my iniquity<WH5771>; for it is great<WH7227>.
What man<WH376> is he that fears<WH3373> the Lord<WH3068>? him shall he teach<WH3384> in the way<WH1870> that he shall choose<WH977>.
His soul<WH5315> shall live<WH3885> at ease<WH2896>; and his seed<WH2233> shall inherit<WH3423> the earth<WH776>.
The secret<WH5475> of the Lord<WH3068> is with them that fear<WH3373> him<WH3045>; and he will show them his covenant<WH1285>.
My eyes<WH5869> are ever<WH8548> toward the Lord<WH3068>; for he shall pluck<WH3318> my feet<WH7272> out of the net<WH7568>.
Turn<WH6437> you unto me<WH2603>, and have mercy upon me<WH3173>; for I am desolate and afflicted<WH6041>.
The troubles<WH6869> of my heart<WH3824> are enlarged<WH7337>: O bring you me out<WH3318> of my distresses<WH4691>.
Look<WH7200> upon my affliction<WH6040> and my pain<WH5999>; and forgive<WH5375> all my sins<WH2403>.
Consider<WH7200> my enemies<WH341>; for they are many<WH7231>; and they hate<WH8130> me with cruel<WH2555> hatred<WH8135>.
O keep<WH8104> my soul<WH5315>, and deliver<WH5337> me<WH954>: let me not be ashamed; for I put my trust in you<WH2620>.
Let integrity<WH8537> and uprightness<WH3476> preserve<WH5341> me<WH6960>; for I wait on you.
Redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478>, O God<WH430>, out of all his troubles<WH6869>.
